sub_title: Supporting companies by adding to their bottom line, correcting wage premiums. Applying for credits over ’17 - '21and enrolling new staff correctly. Great to do this in a motivated team, growing and building
summary:
My working life has almost always been in the commercial field, as it is now. A beautiful profession.
Both internally and externally I like to look at logic in the processes in order to work as pleasantly and effectively as possible. As a result I have time for nice conversations, meeting people and building long relationships.
Feel free to add me to your network, or let me know if you think we can help each other.

With Zekerheyd we ensure effective and efficient processes in which Dutch employers no longer miss any benefits or incur unnecessary costs.
Employers pay unnecessarily high premiums and miss out on benefits related to wage cost benefits and sickness benefits. By analyzing this, we save avg. 0.8-2% of the wage bill and together we set up the processes in such a way that it is under control in the future.
I would be happy to explain to you how we do this.

In addition to my work, I am also involved in research into the effect of variable remuneration on sales teams. There is a strong interface between these topics. A lot of money and energy is spent on variable remuneration, but it is unclear whether it works. Science shows it wouldn't/shouldn't work, in practice variable pay has been increasing for decades. 

And while we are talking about effectiveness; undisturbed work is nice. That's why I still have a webshop with do not disturb lights, Luxafor (the majority goes through online portals such as Bol).

You can find information about the research and the do not disturb lights at www.maver.nu.

A final role (except privately of course) that I have is supervising students at Avans during their graduation. I myself studied during my work, I know the frustrations. It is nice to support them during this. This also provides great insights into other companies and processes.

Want to know more about the things I'm working on, feel free to call me on 06 1334 2934.

education.field_of_study: Marketing  / Commerciële economie (CE) - Specialisatie marketing management

publications.name: De relatie tussen bedrijfscultuur en motivatie. Leidt variabele beloning van salesmedewerkers tot een verandering in motivatie en indirect op bedrijfsresultaat?

authors.headline: Supporting companies by adding to their bottom line, correcting wage premiums. Applying for credits over ’17 - '21and enrolling new staff correctly. Great to do this in a motivated team, growing and building

profile_positions.description:
We analyze whether you have not paid too many premiums and we initiate the process to get them corrected (for the future) and credited (2017). 
Successful in 96% of the cases and for companies over 20 employees even a 100% score. 
The great thing is that we work on a no-cure-no-pay basis, for new employees this is a small subscription model and supplemented with no-cure-no-pay, so we bring money and it costs you hardly any time. 

Want to know more, feel free to call me.
profile_positions.title: Manager business development

profile_positions.description:
During the graduation process I supervise 4 students on the graduation process.
A nice combination with a regular job to keep up with the sharpness of study and research.
The link with the Finance and Control course and my job at Loonkostenvoordelen is a nice combination.
Including the link to my personal multi-year research into the effect of bonuses on operating results. https://bit.ly/varpay2020
profile_positions.title: graduation supervisor

profile_positions.description: Temporary operational support and process improvement for the purchasing department of this wonderful family owned and fast-growing company.
profile_positions.title: Purchaser a.i.

profile_positions.description:
Lavans is a family owned full-service laundry. Focusing on clothing, sanitary products and floor hygiene. With over 200 employees we service over 10.000 (mainly) Dutch customers in the whole spectrum of businesses. 
Working based on self-regulating teams had been initiated (but not followed up-on) within Lavans since early 2000’s. Implementing this change to responsibilities and behaviours low in the organization and achieving turnover target has my focus. This within the tension of a declining result. Total> 90FTE, 9 of which are direct. 

Responsibilities	
•	Organisational development
•	Turnover (profit) growth
•	Wages
•	Transform communication dept. to marketing dept.
Successes
•	Achieved turnover goals with declining sales team
•	Improved clarity and acceptation on self-regulation in teams
•	Increased cooperation within and over teams
•	Change to marketing with clear objectives
profile_positions.title: Manager Sales and Marketing (Management team)

profile_positions.description:
Klantenvertelen is a SAAS environment with which 18,000+ companies within and outside the Netherlands collect reviews and subsequently integrate these in their marketing. With the back-office team of 10 people (understaffed) with which we are responsible are for the optimization of 18,000 customers. 7 direct reports and 3 indirect.
Responsibilities	
•	Decrease churn
•	Increase upsell
•	Increase activation
•	Employee satisfaction	
Successes
•	Constantly beating turnover targets through low churn and high upsell
•	Stability and calmness in team despite software migration
•	Speed up of onboarding new team members
profile_positions.title: Manager sales

profile_positions.description:
eFaqt is an online tool to study smarter / more effectively. Combining multiple proven study methods in an online environment. As a start-up eFaqt had the ambition to grow fast and worldwide. To achieve these goals various investment rounds were made. 

In my role I was responsible to achieve growth in sales to schools and businesses. We achieved growth both in my part and the consumer part. Unfortunately, the growth speed was not strong enough to justify the investments. As a result, eFaqt bootstrapped and is still going strong with its founder.

Achievements:
Closed multiple deals with schools.
Stronger onboarding for schools and teachers.
Further and new cooperation with resellers.
profile_positions.title: Business to business Manager

profile_positions.description:
MaVer Marketing and Sales (www.maver.nu), 2015- present
MaVer Marketing and Sales supports organisations in building efficient and effective marketing and sales processes.

How
Integrating on- and offline communication and systems. 
Clearifying and identifying opportunities and threats
Bringing strategy and execution in line with clear tasks and goals.

Available for strategy, execution and interim

Størvatt (www.storvatt.com) was the first brand (1997) of wood fired hottubs in Western Europe. Local production started in 1999, focus on high quality, short delivery times and innovation.
Industry: leisure, wellness, luxury goods

Developments between 2008 and 2013.
•	Significant increase in turnover and profitability.
•	Building stronger and self-sustaining distribution channel.
•	Product development to deeper and broader product portfolio, consisting of;
•	Introduction of The Pod (www.thepod.info) to the Benelux leisure market, which led to the start of Reacc.

REACC (www.reacc.nl) focusses on sales of original accommodations for the leisure industry.
I was 1 of 3 shareholders

Responsibilities: 
•	Sales in The Netherlands, Belgium, Luxembourg and Germany
•	Marketing strategy and execution

In 2014 I changed from full-time entrepeneur to employment. However in MaVer is still have some activitities:
Supporting other entrenepeneurs with marketing and sales
sales of Luxafor (www.maver.nu/shop)
Lease of www.thepod.info to CenterParcs Port Zélande

profile_positions.description:
This business unit of Spie focusses on the design, building and maintaining (water, electricity, data etc) infrastructure on leisure facilities. The team consists of 18FTE (5 direct and 13 indirect reports) operational, technical and commercial

Responsibilities

•	Improve project and team result
•	P&L responsible	

Successes
•	Set-up and finalised internal reorganisation
•	Changed from department loss to profit
•	Decreased operational expenditure
•	Increased trust with customers and suppliers

profile_positions.description:
Schuitema was the wholesale organisation for C1000. Soft franchise, independent local entrepreneurs and high quality consulting enable strong local market power.
Responsibilities:

Successes:

•	Leading in successful implementations of new concepts
Capabilities

•	Leading without hierarchy 
•	Achieve results based on ratio and / or emotion

profile_positions.description:
Hi-Ti was a spin-off of Acer/BenQ Taiwan, with a focus on production of photo printers for home and So-HO market. Building European HQ, I was asked to join by a former colleague of Acer / BenQ.
Responsibilities

Successes

•	Intermediate between Taiwanese management and rest of company.
Capabilities
•	Hierarchical responsibility

volunteer_experiences.description: With the group of volunteers we work hard to keep a healthy and happy tennis club. Initiating new activities for existing and new members; young and old.

Vanuit ondernemerschap heb ik twee studentbedrijven mogen begeleiden in hun project om een nieuw product te ontwikkelen en te lanceren.
Product idee, financiering, vermarkten van het product en liquidatie van de organisatie waren de stappen die gezet werden.

2 Groepen van ieder 5-6 studenten studeerden Commerciële Economie International Event, Music & Entertainment bij Fontys Hogeschool in Tilburg.

De Club van 100 stelt zich tot doel het niet-prestatiegerichte jeugdhockey binnen MEP te ondersteunen en te stimuleren. We richten ons daarbij op de allerjongsten (de Meppertjes) t/m de D-jeugd en alle overige niet-prestatiegerichte jeugdteams (C,B en A jeugd). Waar we kunnen, ondersteunen we onze club om ervoor te zorgen dat onze jonge (aspirant)leden onbezorgd en goed gefaciliteerd hockeyplezier kunnen beleven.
